subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: SAN DIEGO, Aug. 8 (AP) — David Wells is finished with his hometown San Diego Padres, and it is possible that baseball has seen the last of the boisterous left-hander known as Boomer.
snippet: SAN DIEGO, Aug. 8 (AP) — David Wells is finished with his hometown San Diego Padres, and it is possible that baseball has seen the last of the boisterous left-hander known as Boomer.
